name: The Lost Dragon - Discos, Dragons, & Dungeons - Retro Style
blurb: Dragons, Disco, and Dungeons. Become the hero we need and get your groove on in a free to play browser game.

rewards.reward: No Reward
'Gee Wiz.'\r\n\r\nLike a heart felt thank you, of the email variety.

'Far Out Man.'

We will put your name, or a name of your choosing on a support page that will be found on the website.

We reserve the right to refuse anything we deem inappropriate.

You will also receive all pledge bonuses prior to this one, excluding limited items.
'Sugar Daddy.' Start the game out with a rich inheritance in the bank. You will also receive all pledge bonuses prior to this one, excluding limited items.
'Ready To Brawl.' Start the game with an even bigger stash of weapons. This time you'll get a long sword and mace. You will also receive all pledge bonuses prior to this one, excluding limited items.

'For Rizzle.'

Like, you can totally name an item in our game!

We reserve the right to refuse anything we deem inappropriate. You will also receive all pledge bonuses prior to this one, excluding limited items.

--Once the project is funded we will email you the picture of an item. After that all you need to do is email the name of the item back.--

'Psyche Out.'

Like, you can totally name an NPC (Non-player character) in our game!

We reserve the right to refuse anything we deem inappropriate. You will also receive all pledge bonuses prior to this one, excluding limited items.

--Once the project is funded we will email you the picture of an NPC. After that all you need to do is email the name of the item back.--

'Way Cool.'

Like, you can totally name a monster in our game!
Yes, your ex's name is totally acceptable.

We reserve the right to refuse anything we deem inappropriate. You will also receive all pledge bonuses prior to this one, excluding limited items.

--Once the project is funded we will email you the picture of a monster. After that all you need to do is email the name of the item back.--
